Name: OpenMW-TES3MP
Overview: TES3MP is a project adding multiplayer functionality to OpenMW, a free and open source engine recreation of the popular Bethesda Softworks game "The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind".

TCP - GamePort.Name: TCP - GamePort
TCP - GamePort.Description: TCP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the port number in the config!)

UDP - GamePort.Name: UDP - GamePort
UDP - GamePort.Description: UDP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to change the port number in the config!)

Game Version.Name: Game Version
Game Version.Description: Preferred game version goes here (set to ‘latest’ to download the latest and check on every startup if there is a newer version available)

Extra Game Parameters.Name: Extra Game Parameters
Extra Game Parameters.Description: Extra startup Parameters if needed (leave empty if not needed)

UMASK.Name: UMASK
UMASK.Description: Permissions for newly created files. Don’t change unless you are knowing what you are doing!
